iti79:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti79:2.1: “These three things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
iti79:2.3: It’s when a mendicant relishes work,
iti79:2.6: These three things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
iti79:3.1: These three things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
iti79:3.3: It’s when a mendicant doesn’t relish work,
iti79:3.6: These three things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
iti79:5.1: That’s why one ought have few duties,
iti79:6.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
